title: Adult Neurology Clinic
tagline: Specialized care for brain and nervous system health.
overview: Comprehensive diagnosis and management of neurological disorders including stroke, epilepsy and headaches.
detailedDescription: Our Adult Neurology Clinic provides evidence-based evaluation and long-term management for disorders of the brain, spinal cord and peripheral nerves. We combine advanced diagnostics with personalised care plans to improve function and quality of life.

doctors.name: Dr. Silvanus Wabwire
doctors.title: Consultant Neurologist
doctors.bio: Consultant neurologist with extensive experience in stroke care, seizure management and neurorehabilitation.

doctors.title: Neurologist
doctors.bio: Specialist in headache disorders and neurodiagnostic testing, focused on patient-centred care.

testimonials.name: Joseph K.
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: The neurology team explained my condition clearly and supported my rehabilitation every step of the way.

title: Antenatal & Obstetrics Clinic
tagline: Compassionate maternity care at every stage.
overview: Complete antenatal, intrapartum and postnatal services for safe pregnancy and delivery.
detailedDescription: Our Obstetrics team provides comprehensive antenatal monitoring, high-risk pregnancy management and postnatal support. We emphasise evidence-based practice and compassionate communication for expectant mothers and families.

doctors.name: Dr. Gladys Karume
doctors.title: Consultant Obstetrician
doctors.bio: Experienced obstetrician specialising in high-risk pregnancy and maternal-fetal medicine.

doctors.bio: Focuses on antenatal care, labour management and patient education.

testimonials.name: Grace M.
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: The antenatal team made me feel safe and informed throughout my pregnancy.

title: Breast Clinic
tagline: Early detection with multidisciplinary support.
overview: Screening, diagnostic imaging and specialist management for breast disease.
detailedDescription: Our multidisciplinary Breast Clinic provides mammography, ultrasound, biopsy services and personalised treatment planning. We prioritise early detection, timely diagnosis and compassionate patient support.

doctors.name: Dr. Eric Hungu
doctors.title: Breast Surgeon
doctors.bio: Specialist in breast surgery and multidisciplinary cancer care with emphasis on early intervention.

testimonials.name: Lucy K.
testimonials.title: Patient

title: Cardiology Clinic
tagline: Expert heart care with modern diagnostics.
overview: Diagnosis and management of cardiovascular disease including heart failure, arrhythmia and ischemic heart disease.
detailedDescription: Our Cardiology team combines advanced diagnostic testing — ECG, echocardiography and stress testing — with evidence-based treatments and cardiac rehabilitation to optimise heart health.

title: Chest & TB Clinic

overview: Screening, diagnosis and treatment for tuberculosis and chronic respiratory conditions.
detailedDescription: The Chest & TB Clinic provides tuberculosis diagnosis, directly observed therapy (DOT), and comprehensive management of chronic respiratory illnesses with a strong public-health focus.

doctors.bio: Experienced pulmonologist with a focus on infectious and chronic respiratory disease management.

overview: Growth monitoring, immunizations and developmental screening for infants and young children.

title: Colorectal Surgery Clinic
tagline: Specialised care for colorectal disorders.
overview: Diagnosis and surgical management of colon, rectal and anal diseases using minimally invasive techniques.

overview: Comprehensive management of dermatologic conditions and cosmetic dermatology services.
